Let's put this up to github!

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
gdp <- read_delim("../../Downloads/oecd-gdp.csv.bz2")
gdp %>%
  head()
```


```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
gdpLong <-
  gdp %>%
  pivot_longer(!c(country, indicator))
gdpLong %>%
  head(10)
```


```{r}
gdpLong <-
  gdp %>%
  pivot_longer(!c(country, indicator),
           	names_to = "year",
           	values_to = "gdp")
gdpLong %>%
  head(10)
```


```{r}
gdpLong <-
  gdp %>%
  pivot_longer(!c(country, indicator),
           	names_to = "year",
           	values_to = "gdp") %>%
  mutate(year = as.numeric(year))
gdpLong %>%
  head(10)
```


```{r}
p <- data.frame(pregnant = c("Yes", "No"),
            	male = c(NA, 25),
            	female = c(11, 18))
p
```


```{r}
pl <- p %>%
  pivot_longer(c(male, female),
           	names_to = "sex",
           	values_to = "count")
pl
```


```{r}
pl %>%
  pivot_wider(id_cols = pregnant,
          	names_from = sex,
          	values_from = count)
```
